snippet: SAPIR--Louis. The board and staff of Mount Pleasant Westchester Cemetery mourn the loss of our former longtime president and board chair, Lou Sapir. For 60 years he exercised his good judgement to create the cemetery's secure financial foundation, provide for its care and maintenance, and ensure its natural beauty for our plot holders and their families. He led Mount Pleasant with dedication, strength, and wisdom. We send our heartfelt condolences to his family. 1/3
